reviewText: Post uses her own experiences and training to bring the listener to a deeper awareness of how to reconnect with herself. Her ability to break down walls and superficiality is clear in this DVD, and she masterfully takes us from a place of waiting to hear the next insight to being able to discover our own insight. No gurus necessary - trust the information you receive. You will want to listen with a notebook and pen nearby to take notes for future reference. (And hang on to your copy - you'll want to listen again for future reference!)
